description: a(n) = floor[ratio of product and sum of first n numbers].
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); for (n=1, 100, if (n==1, f=2, f*=(n - 1)); write("b061370.txt", n, " ", f\(n + 1)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 22 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 02 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 07 2001
